item.description:
ORAGNIZER: Will
CONTACT: http://photo.meetup.c...
WHO: All members

this Event runs July 12th to the 15 and Balloon launches are typically 6am / 6pm with weather permiting

there is no general admission, but there are nominal admissions for certain things around the Festival / Fair (also may have a parking fee as well)

I will also be doing other shoots between the launches, such as antique trucks, stone bridges and few other locations...for example plz check out the Henniker / Hillsborough Day Trip photo albums or my Flickr.com page

also those interested in possibly carpooling we could meet at the Mall of NH in Manchester, NH or we can work on making other arrangements via discussing them on the Msg Board (keep in mind will have to meet up really early to get there before the 6am Launch time)

any questions plz feel free to Email me,
~Will

Info Link:
http://www.balloonfes...
item.name: Hillsborough Hot Air Balloon Festival
